original_text: And if anyone's name was not found written in the book of life, he was thrown into the lake of fire.
korean_text: 누구든지 생명책에 기록되지 못한 자는 불못에 던져지더라

sentences.original_text: And if anyone's name was not found written in the book of life
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 누구의 이름이 생명책에 기록되어 있지 않으면

sentences.original_text: he was thrown into the lake of fire.
